wikipedia_page.main: Sir Benjamin Louis Cohen, 1st Baronet (18 November 1844 – 8 November 1909) was a British businessman and Conservative politician.

response: * Sir Benjamin Cohen, 1st Baronet (1844–1909), British politician and Jewish communal leader, MP for Islington East, 1892–1906

response: *** Sir Benjamin Cohen, 1st Baronet (1844–1909), British politician and Jewish communal leader, MP for Islington East, 1892–1906

In 1954, Copisarow married Diana (1933-2019), daughter of Maj. Ellis James Castello, M.C. and a descendant on her mother's side of Alfred Louis Cohen, brother of Sir Benjamin Cohen, 1st Baronet. They had four children.Burke's Peerage, Baronetage and Knightage, 107th ed., 2003, vol. 3, p. 4037The Samuel Family of Liverpool and London: from 1755 onwards, a biographical and genealogical dictionary of the descendants of Emanuel Samuel, R. J. d'A. Hart, Routledge and Paul, 1958, pp. 14, 1955
